name: Mega Man X Dive Offline
storyline:
Game data from various games is stored in the Cyberworld region of Deep Log.

An unknown bug has caused the game data for Mega Man X to become corrupted.

It's up to you, the player, to follow the guidance of RiCO, a Navigator who's appeared out of nowhere. You're going to "DiVE" into the world of Deep Log and figure out what's going on!

Take control of Hunter Programs based on X, Zero, and other Hunters, to defeat Maverick data and repair the game!
summary:
The newest entry in the hit action series Mega Man X makes its way to Steam and smartphones! Strengthen your characters and weapons with a variety of powerups to make them all your own. Then test them out in the side-scrolling action of "what-if" worlds in Mega Man X!

This product is the offline version of Mega Man X DiVE. Online features such as Battle Mode, Co-op, Ranking, Guild, and Capsule are not included. Collaboration contents such as characters and stages from other Capcom franchises are not available in the game.
